Texts.Chs: 恭喜你有了新的^orange;装备合成器^reset;！你可以利用它使用极少或不使用金属成分来创建各种^green;衣服和盔甲^reset。你首先可以试着制作一个^orange;骨制面具^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Congratulations on your new ^orange;Clothing Fabricator^reset;! You can utilize it to create various ^green;clothes and armors^reset; that use little or no metal components. Start by making a ^orange;Bone Mask^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 你也可以使用它来制造一些织物，从棉花到丝绸等。这真是一项非常实用的发明。而且，^green;由它制作的盔甲^reset;也不会显得过于破败。
Texts.Eng: You can also produce fabrics in this station, from cotton to silk and beyond. It really is a robust creation. The ^green;armors it makes^reset; aren't too shabby either!
